text: I've heard from families in Alabama who are being forced to drive hours to find infant formula. Today I'm joining @HouseDemocrats in voting to get the FDA the resources needed to address this shortage. We must ensure families ALWAYS have access to safe formula. #FeedOurInfants https://t.co/iTZMsKrSH1
